name: LÖVE
body:
### Welcome to LÖVE.
Hi there! LÖVE is an *awesome* framework you can use to make 2D games in Lua. It's free, open-source, and works on Windows,Linux.

### Licence
LÖVE is licensed under the MIT licence ^_^

### Authors and Contributors
This version of LÖVE is created by Muresan Vlad Mihail. 

### Support or Contact
Having troubles with LÖVE? Make a new issue or leave me a message on twitter: https://twitter.com/Murii5

# Examples
It’s pretty easy to get started with LÖVE, just check out these code snippets.
## Drawing text
`   
function love.draw()
  love.graphics.print("Hello World!", 400, 300)
 end
`
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
